emergence.safety

Class SafetyAdvance

  • java.lang.Object
    • emergence.safety.ASafety
      • emergence.safety.SafetyAdvance

  • public class SafetyAdvance
extends ASafety
    A Safety which checks a action by executing the action several times.
    Author:
    spakken

      • isSafe

        public boolean isSafe(core.game.StateObservation stateObs,
             ontology.Types.ACTIONS a)
        Returns true if a action is safe. The action is executed a specified number of times, if the player loses in one of the executions it returns false, true otherwise.
